experience: You and Ann both know David Cohen, Richard Swanson, and 3 others

Our Mission: To help sellers in the e-commerce space establish relationships with wholesalers, make wise purchasing decisions, and scale their businesses using the e-commerce platform of their choice through our practical workshops, state-of-the-art online training system, and highly relational E-Commerce Business School community.Our Values•	We believe in respecting the experience and intelligence of our students. •	We believe a strong work ethic can overcome deficiencies in technological know-how. •	We believe in keeping our students up-to-date with changes in the marketplace. •	We believe in the importance of integrity and due diligence as a way of preserving and growing one's capital. •	We believe the best training is systematic, organized, and thorough... while remaining personal. •	We believe learning is maximized in a community of those who share our goals.

The E-Commerce Masters Program teaches you every component of building a successful eCommerce business including how to scale and maximize profits off the biggest eCommerce sites in the world, build sales funnels that sift and sort customers for you, brand your products and business, list building, traffic generation, consultative sales techniques, team building & management, business leadership, mindset training and how to play to your unique strengths.Get a Free Lesson at: https://ecommerce-arbitrage.com
I am the CEO of 80/20 Marketing and work along side my two business partners Isaiah Sieg and Brian Sieg. We help network marketers take their business online and attract business to them.

Owner and CEO of 80/20 Marketing, Inc. Author of "The Renegade Network Marketer", "The Attraction Marketer's Manifesto" and "The 7 Great Lies of Network Marketing". Creator of The Renegade Team membership platform training network marketers and traditional business owners to market their business online.
Internet Marketer Training Network Marketers To Attract Leads To Them Online

I am an Attraction Marketing Author, Trainer, Speaker and Consultant.Together with my 80/20 Marketing corporate team we have helped tens of thousands of business owners better optimize their marketing efforts by teaching and implementing attraction marketing principles. My breakthrough book "The Renegade Network Marketer", with over 4 million dollars in sales, has been considered by many to be the Bible for online network marketers. Some of my websites:    http://therenegadeblog.com    http://annsieg.com/    http://marketersmanifesto.com/    http://the7greatliesofnetworkmarketing.com/    http://therenegadenetworkmarketer.com/    http://twitter.com/Ann_Sieg/    My Mission:My team and I help traditional business owners, home based entrepreneurs and network marketers create a sustainable business model by implementing effective marketing strategies to attract prospects to them.Some of my products and services:The Renegade Network MarketerProduct Review Page: http://therenegadenetworkmarketer.com/MLM Blog SecretsProduct Review Page: https://mlmblogsecrets.com/Order Page: https://mlmblogsecrets.com/order/The Ultimate Copywriting Crash CourseProduct Review Page: http://ultimatecopywritingcrashcourse.com/Our corporate vision:We help network marketers become real entrepreneurs by creating and owning their own assets.We believe in creating self-sufficient individuals, families and communities. We do this by creating networks and partnerships with people who align with our vision and goals to help execute it.We believe in transitioning our economy from having people work for a handful of large corporations to spreading that out into many small businesses where people can be better served.We believe the best way to help people give to their favorites and contributions is to help them become financially independent and wealthy.

My team and I put on events throughout the year.  There is one person I like to say who has spoiled us rotten when it comes to amazing customer support for my community events and that is Kaylin Strohbehn.  We've had my own staff members say, "This is my second home." I wish I could work with Kaylin at all our other events we host throughout the country.  No one comes close to Kaylin.  She's the gold standard for making our events personal and professional.  I can't recommend Kaylin highly enough!Ann SiegCEO - 8020 Marketing, Inc.

summary: I have been dubbed “The Godmother of Attraction Marketing” for her pioneering work on how to get new customers and prospects to come to you.I've had an impact on tens of thousands of people – from beginning entrepreneurs to CEOs – through my groundbreaking coaching and training programs. My reports have been read by over 400,000 people worldwide and have helped many people achieve 6, 7 and even 8 figure incomes.Since focusing on e-commerce, I have developed multiple training courses, membership programs and workshops with expert training and emphasis on selling on Amazon, eBay, etc. to help meet my student’s needs at every level possible.My team and I deliver dozens of live, hands-on workshops every year across the country, as well as trips to China and the Canton Fair – the largest trade show in the world.Today, I devote my time to the e-Commerce Business School launched in 2016. The goal of our training platform is to help e-commerce marketers gain rapid progress in their businesses by providing professional training and coaching within a highly interactive community.
name: Ann Sieg
title: Founder, E-Commerce Business School - CEO, 8020 Marketing Inc.
